mapper.insert: insert into mony set che=#{mony.che}, erd=#{mony.erd}, huib=#{mony.huib}, birth=now(), huier=#{mony.huier}, `name`=#{mony.name}, zhus=#{mony.zhus}
mapper.update: update mony set che=#{mony.che}, erd=#{mony.erd}, huib=#{mony.huib}, birth=now(), huier=#{mony.huier}, `name`=#{mony.name}, zhus=#{mony.zhus}, id=#{mony.id}
